data.title: Great resource for visitors and locals
data.text: I went in today to get some ideas for family coming to visit next month. They are loaded with resources, and D is very helpful. You can even pick up some souvenirs for the kids! Parking is located behind the building, make your turn on Tenth street. While there, try to visit the two historic homes in the same complex; the Browns are local heroes and great custodians of these treasures.

data.title: It's right near Knott's
data.text: This is a nice place to stop for information. The people there are so friendly and helpful. You can also buy some items, like the Knott's Berry Farm jam, which is yummy.

data.title: Planning a trip.
data.text: If your going to visit anywhere in California this is the place to get all your information.  Local or up north they have everything you need plus you can buy event tickets.

data.title: Has everything you need
data.text: Definitely a must-stop for those near and far to grab maps, brochures, and even purchase ticket packages for all of southern California's attractions. THEN, head next door to the little restaurant called the Tice House...best food in town.

data.title: Maps and Brochures
data.text:
If you're looking for free maps and brochures for Los Angeles and Orange County. This is the place. You'll find much more here. You'll also find discounted tickets to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. Also there are a few great props at this location that are perfect photo opps. 

This building is historic and it looks even better when you step inside.

data.title: Great place to start out your trip.
data.text: This is the only place I could find that had discount tickets for Disneyland for the one day ticket.  They were so nice and helpful and had all sorts of coupons and brochures  for attractions all over California.

data.title: A Must First Stop
data.text: If you are new to Southern California and need information on where to go and what to do this should be your first stop.  This welcome center like others has information on local and area attractions.  Tons of maps, coupons and tickets. Volunteer staff is well informed and very helpful.

data.title: Lots of good maps and info!!!
data.text: The staff was pleasant and I even got a little freebie - luggage tag! Lots of maps and info at your fingertips - I recommend stopping in there before hitting the road in LA/OC area.  I actually stopped in there in 2014 and still used the info I received from there in my 2015 and 2016 trips.

data.title: worth a visit
data.text: stopped at this place for a rest after a long drive.. well worth it, lots of info on everything you need when visiting. recomended

data.title: Great Place for Local Info and Discount Coupons
data.text: The staff here is always friendly and helpful. They offer discount coupons to many local attractions and restaurants and there is a great selection of information on other CA areas. Plus, it's fun to have your photo taken with the miner and saloon girl.

data.title: Good for information
data.text: We stopped off several of these centres as were on our road trip and accumulated brochures, flyers and had queries that needed answering.

data.title: Group planning and travel support
data.text:
We were so thankful to be in contact with the California Welcome Center-Orange County they were very helpful and supportive with our plans and travel needs.
I wish I had been in contact with them in the onset but from the time I was in contact with them had no concerns!
Joab our contact and travel liaison was fantastic! He made sure we were met at the airport as well as personally meeting us at the hotel to present us with information, coupons, maps and directions for the area. Joab was very personable throughout the process from the telephone call to initiate everything to the completion of the trip by meeting with our group at  our last stop to provide bags and small thank you gifts.
Our group was large with 27 individuals to find activities,meals and transportation for. We had a very smooth time and the support with the transportation was fantastic.
I have already recommended the California Welcome Center to a few of my friends that may be travelling with their families- and I would definitely recommend contacting them if you are travelling as a group to the area. The staff are kind, caring , knowledgeable and willing to make your visit fantastic. Thanks to the center and a personal shout out to Joab.!

data.title: fantastic trip
data.text: Our trip was flawless. Dream Vacation builders had everything set up and ready for our arrival and were very helpful while we were there.  Would highly recommend them to anyone traveling to the theme parks in Southern California.

data.title: awesome deal
data.text: We purchased Disneyland tickets online from Dream Vacation Builders.  I was a little nervous since there weren't many reviews.  The tickets came as e-tickets.  We printed them out before our vacation.  We were able to skip the ticket booth line, took them right to the turnstyle and they were exchanged there for the actual tickets.  NO PROBLEMS at all!  Best price I could find anywhere.  Thanks for a little savings.

data.title: Dream Vacation Builders
data.text: The service was excellent and we appreciated for prompt responds for our questions. A truly first class and memorable stay.

data.title: Simply the Best
data.text: Over the past years it has been my privilege to escort two groups consisting of 50  'Special Needs' adults to Disneyland, Anaheim from Australia.  It was our good fortune to discover Joab Flores the owner of Southern California Ticket & Tour Centre by Dream Vacation Builders whose service met every need we had during our stay.  Joab actually went beyond the call of duty when one of our people became ill by driving them to the local hospital and then helping others get to sporting venues as part of his service.  This year (2015) I am returning with just my family members and there will be no one else we shall look to for all our ticketing and accommodation needs than this professional trustworthy organisation which has a heart!

data.title: The WOW factor
data.text:
When looking after a touring sports team of 30+ you need things to run smoothly. That's exactly the service and advise we received from Joab and his team. Nothing was too much trouble. They provided everything we needed with an extremely professional approach and helped make our tour the trip of a life time. 
I highly recommend the team at the California Welcome Centre - Orange County. 
Craig from Down Under

data.title: Worth a Visit
data.text: The people there were very helpful and cordial. The choice of brochures, which covered the entire state, was overwhelming. We will make it a point to visit the other centers as we travel.

data.title: Worth a look for tourists.
data.text: Nice place to pick up free maps, guides, magazines and info of the area. Friendly employee was very helpful.

data.title: Discounted Tickets & Tours
data.text:
The Orange County California Welcome Center has now a Ticket Vendor -Southern California Ticket & Tour Center-, coming in on November 1, 2014. Now you may purchase Theme Park/Attraction tickets at a discount price.

The California Welcome Center in Orange County and The Southern California Ticket & Tour Center  offer personal, concierge-style service to all of visitors including travelers essentials like:

-Discounted Attraction Tickets and Tours.
-Free brochures from throughout the state 
-Free maps and directions. 
-Free brochures and maps for the Orange County Area. 
-Free internet and computer access.
-Dining recommendations and reservations -Purchase discounted attraction tickets.
-Purchase and redeem LA GO Cards -Book last minute hotel rooms. 
-Public Restrooms available.

......and now finding all your Southern California attraction tickets in one place, you'll have more time to enjoy your vacation. You may purchase tickets tickets as well online on californiaticketandtourcenter.com 

Joab Gesell-Flores
OC Specialist
